New Records: Andries Gous scored a career-best 80 in the match
Key Match Events: Quinton de Kock scored 74 off 43 balls
Kagiso Rabada took 3 wickets for 18 runs
Andries Gous and Harmeet Singh shared a 91-run partnership for the sixth wicket
Pre-Game Insights: The debate ahead of the match was which of the three seamers to leave out
South Africa decided to leave Ottneil Baartman out in favour of Kagiso Rabada's experience
Post-Match Reflections: South Africa earned their first Super Eight points
Andries Gous relished the chance to play against the country of his birth and let them have it
Miscellaneous Highlights: USA's fielding got them back into the game from excellent catches
USA gave away 53 runs in the last five overs and will not be entirely happy with some of their bowling
